# mutableCopy(with:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a mutable copy of a caption region.

## Declaration

```swift
func mutableCopy(with zone: NSZone? = nil) -> Any
```

## Parameters

- **zone**: The system ignores this parameter. Objective-C doesnâ€™t no longer supports memory zones.

## Return Value

A copy of the region.

## Discussion

This method throws an exception if the caption region contains an identifier.

## Processing regions

- **encode(with:)**: Encodes the region using the specified encoder.
- **isEqual(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an object equals another.
